name: Hyacinth
description:
Hyacinth was made in three days by a team of two for Mini Jam 103: Darkness.

For the theme, we were deeply inspired by inner darkness, especially in terms of mental health. Luckily, the limitation, "you are your own enemy," worked out quite well with that in mind! We hope that you enjoy the finished product, especially if you resonate with Neo's story. Remember, things will get better <3

Also of note: we had some troubles getting the program icon to work, so we apologize if it appears as the default :(  If you happen to come across any other bugs, please let us know in the comments!

  

Features:
  • 20-25 minutes of gameplay
  • One ending with a secret bonus scene to unlock
  • A charming demon to play cards with
  • A constant vague feeling of being out of place
  • Ominous voices. Everywhere.

  

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Confirm

X: Cancel, Open Menu

Shift: Sprint

Hyacinth vases are save points!  

 

Credits:

etoiledust: Lead Art Design, Programming

Witchrity: Lead Writing, Sound Design/Composing

 

CONTENT WARNING: Horror, hospital scenery, general themes of death.
